allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add doctor appointments management and mark complete functionality

Backend changes:
- Add CompleteAppointmentCommand and handler for marking appointments complete
- Update Appointment entity Complete\(\) method to accept optional notes
- Add CompleteAppointment API endpoint \(PATCH /api/appointments/{id}/complete\)
- Enhanced validation for appointment status transitions

Frontend changes:
- Create DoctorAppointmentsListComponent with filtering and search
  - Filter by status \(scheduled, confirmed, completed, etc.\)
  - Filter by date \(today, week, month\)
  - Search by patient name or reason
- Create DoctorAppointmentDetailComponent
  - View full appointment details
  - Mark appointment as completed with optional notes
  - Modal dialog for completion confirmation
- Add completeAppointment\(\) method to AppointmentService
- Update doctor routing to include appointments list and detail views

Features completed:
- Feature 2: Doctor Appointments List with filters
- Feature 3: Mark Complete functionality \(backend + frontend\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
